trans-unit.source: Represents a panel that arranges items in a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonGallery"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Egy panel, amely az elemek rendezése jelöli egy <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonGallery"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.Primitives.RibbonGalleryItemsPanel"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Egy új példányát inicializálja a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.Primitives.RibbonGalleryItemsPanel"> </xref> osztály.

trans-unit.source: Positions and sizes the child elements in this <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonGallery"></xref> panel.
trans-unit.target: Pozíciók és az alárendelt összetevők ezen méretének <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonGallery"> </xref> panel.

trans-unit.source: The size that the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.Primitives.RibbonGalleryItemsPanel"></xref> needs to position its child elements.
trans-unit.target: A méret, amely a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.Primitives.RibbonGalleryItemsPanel"> </xref> gyermekelemeinek pozícionálni.

trans-unit.source: Measures the child elements in this <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.Primitives.RibbonGalleryItemsPanel"></xref> in preparation of arranging them during the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.Primitives.RibbonGalleryItemsPanel.ArrangeOverride*> pass.
trans-unit.target: Az alárendelt összetevők ezen intézkedések <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.Primitives.RibbonGalleryItemsPanel"> </xref> előkészítése során, azokat a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.Primitives.RibbonGalleryItemsPanel.ArrangeOverride*>megfeleléséhez</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.Primitives.RibbonGalleryItemsPanel.ArrangeOverride*> során elrendezése
